attributes.additional_details:
When something bad happens the media all ways say it is muslims,but in Islam we are about peace andwhoever kills or hurts some one else is not a muslim he is a non believer.
 And i am sur in christianity and judaism it is about peace and if you kill someon you are not part of that religion because you have breaken that religious law.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the media companies to answer;  the Independent Press Standards Association, or Ofcom.
